features: All Natural. Pixie Cup Gel Wash is made from the same ingredients as our 5-star foaming wash. 100% all-natural, plant-based ingredients ensure the best care for you and your menstrual cup or disc.

Versatile. The Pixie Cup Gel Wash also makes a gentle and cleansing feminine wash. Eliminate a bottle in your shower and use this to do two jobs at once. pH balanced, plant-based, biodegradable, with no harsh chemicals, parabens, or preservatives.
Larger Size. Our larger 200 ml bottle means that your Pixie Cup Wash will be there to provide you with a fresh, clean menstrual cup or disc for the long haul.

Thick Texture. Unlike other brands, Pixie Cup Gel Wash isn’t watery and thin, meaning it won’t leak or run off your cup. Our unique texture provides a rich, sudsy lather on your cup so you get a thorough wash.

100% Happiness Promise. We are so confident that you’ll love our products that we back them all with our Happiness Promise. This means if you aren’t totally satisfied, we will make it right. Either a full refund or a replacement product. We’ve got you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All Natural We care about the world in which we live, and we are committed to using all-natural, non-toxic ingredients in all of our products. Better for you--better for the earth. Empower Others With every Pixie Cup purchased, we give another cup to a woman in need. We find our inspiration from Acts 20:35: “…It is more blessed to give than to receive.” Each Pixie Cup is inscribed with this verse as a reminder of the cup given to someone in need. pH-Balanced Feel good about what you're putting into your body.

Pixie Steamer Pixie Wipes Pixie Lube Pixie Kegel Weights Pixie Carry Cup Looking for something that will make your period even easier? Will sterilize your cup in less than 5 minutes! No more hassle! These are great for when you need a quick way to clean your cup, while in a public bathroom. If inserting your cup is difficult this will make your cup slide right into place! Designed to give you even more confidence - resolving any bladder leakage that may occur while laughing, sneezing, coughing or running. Worried about cleaning your cup in public? Fill this nifty gadget with water before you enter the stall. Plop your cup in and shake! It's that easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cup cleaner, would recommend!
reviews.reviewText: Nice mild scent, odd texture in comparison to the foam soap I used last, but works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just ordered my second tube!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Pixie Cup products for over a year and I love each of them! In the beginning, I didn't think I needed a "special soap" to wash my cups, but I'm glad I went ahead and tried it anyway! lol I love this wash! A little goes a long way, the size is easily portable, it's easy to use and I feel like my cups get squeaky clean - plus, I don't have to worry about any weird chemicals that might degrade the cup or cause internal issues. Plus, it's nice having a safe, organic/natural ingredient wash that is used just for my cups. And the price is super reasonable! I'm just now running low on the tube I've had for a year! Go ahead and add this to your cart right now - don't overthink it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does the job. Tho I prefer the foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and clean
reviews.reviewText: This product is smooth and leaves no scent, for someone sensitive to fragrances that's absolutely perfect! My cup is several years old and has lots of staining and while it did not get rid of the stains it did make a noticeable difference in them. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Bang for your buck compared to others I have used
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I have purchased this wash. I love it! It is a bang for you buck and a little goes a long way! It last me about 6 months but I have PCOS and I can have a period ever other week if my body decides to. If I had a regular period, it would probably last more then a year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Se limpia bien para disco y funciona bien.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product & large amount
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t expecting this product to be so large, but I was thrilled because I know it will last me a long time! It cleans my menstrual cup gently but thoroughly without any overpowering scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a very thick gel that did not want to thin out and allow for rubbing across the cups. Will not buy again.
